A meeting is scheduled for July 14, 2025, to discuss specific technical concerns raised by the prospect. Email_Draft.subject: Looking Forward to Our Meeting
Email_Draft.body:
Hi Bruce,

I wanted to confirm our meeting on Tuesday at 11 a.m. PST. I’ll be prepared to discuss how our CRM can effectively manage multiple business units and address your integration concerns with Slack. 

Please let me know if there’s anything specific you’d like to cover.

Best,
David

AI_GENERATED_FOLLOW_UP.Slack_Message: Hi Bruce, just confirming our meeting on Tuesday at 11 a.m. PST. Looking forward to our discussion!
